data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 37,462 believers in the county of Rae Bareli into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Please, teach the 37,462 believers in Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh, India, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Rajput Chamar Gaur people.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Rae Bareli
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Rae Bareli, Uttar Pradesh, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 3,368,138 people in Rae Bareli who are far from you. Please add 681 new house churches this year.

location.name: Rae Bareli
location.people_groups_list: Domar, Lakhera, Bania Ajudhyabansi, Rajput Gautam (Muslim traditions), Sonar Ajudhyabansi (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Domar (25,000), Lakhera (189,000), Bania Ajudhyabansi (98,000), Rajput Gautam (Muslim traditions) (24,000), Sonar Ajudhyabansi (Hindu traditions) (104,000)
